column4: hi, i'm having troubles with my sounds... can someone help me out? :)
can anyone please help me out fix my sound setup? :)
i have a speaker icon on the upper side of my screen. it is enabled but i have no sound at all even during startup
does your hardware work, your speakers or headset ?
but i prefer using ubuntu and use vista only for gaming
so your volume appears to be just fine ? (on both the speaker and in the software )
yes the volume is set to max
what application are you using to play sound ?
you will (possibly) need to setup which audio device VLC is using
this only occured after receiving my notebook from the service center. they had the motherboard replaced
what do you suggest i should do?
setup the device to be used in VLC
i dont think vlc is the issue... i do not even have sounds on startup
well, based on the fact that you had a hardware change, you will want to update the drivers for those devices, if I am not mistaken
how do i know my hardware and the right drivers for it?
thats something I cannot assist you with, good luck
